thread.title: Carly Fiorina Bashes Women’s March Organizers for Not Allowing Pro-Life Groups to Join
thread.title_full: Carly Fiorina Bashes Women’s March Organizers for Not Allowing Pro-Life Groups to Join

author: V Saxena
title: Carly Fiorina Bashes Women’s March Organizers for Not Allowing Pro-Life Groups to Join
text:
230 Anti-Trump Rioters Face up to 10 Years in Prison for Felony Charges 
Listen to her full statement below: 
As for those pro-life women who chose to attend the event despite not being welcome, some of them, including Katie Joy Ussery, reportedly suffered a great deal of abuse. Ussery took to Facebook to described the harrowing harassment:   
“Today at the Women’s march where it was about all women and unity and uplifting each other and love trumps hate, I was told that they hoped I was raped and needed an abortion,” she wrote. “I was spit on. I was physically blocked. I was shouted at in my face. I was told I was betraying other women. I was tripped. Why? Because I was advocating for pre-born women’s rights too.” 
She was not alone. 
“It was a brutal day,” Kristina Hernandez, director of communications for the pro-life organization Students for Life, told USA Today after the march, adding that her group was repeatedly harassed because of its signs.
